thread.title: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 1 live updates
thread.title_full: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 1 live updates

title: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 1 live updates
text:
New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 1 live updates Updated October 17, 2015 8:32 PM By NEWSDAY.COM 
advertisement | advertise on newsday 
Game 1 of the NLCS between the Mets and the Chicago Cubs is underway. 
The Mets beat the Los Angeles Dodgers in five games the NLDS, while the Cubs beat the St. Louis Cardinals in four games. Matt Harvey pitches for the Mets, while Jon Lester takes the mound for the Cubs. See also Boxscore: Mets vs. Cubs NLCS Game 1 Story Syndergaard to start Game 2, LI's Matz to bullpen 
TOP 1: Dexter Fowler struck out swinging. Kyle Schwarber struck out swinging. Kris Bryant grounded out to second. 
BOTTOM 1: Curtis Granderson grounded out to shortstop. David Wright flied out to left. Daniel Murphy homered to right. Cespedes struck out swinging. 
TOP 2: Anthony Rizzo popped out to second. Starlin Castro grounded out to third. Jorge Soler struck out looking. 
advertisement | advertise on newsday 
BOTTOM 2: Travis d'Arnaud singled to right center. MIchael Cuddyer grounded into 6-3 double play.
